description: Details pursuant to condition 19 - detailed drainage of planning approval 24/2777/FUL
decision_conditions:
1. The development shall not be implemented other than in accordance with the drainage strategy as outlined in the documents hereby approved. 
2. The development shall not be occupied until evidence (photographs and installation contracts) is submitted to demonstrate that the sustainable drainage scheme for the site has been completed in accordance with the submitted details.  
3. The sustainable drainage scheme shall be managed and maintained thereafter in accordance with the agreed management and maintenance plan for all of the proposed drainage components.  
Reason: To prevent the risk of flooding to and from the site in accordance with relevant policy requirements including but not limited to London Plan Policy SI 13, its associated Sustainable Design and Construction SPG, the Non-Statutory Technical Standards for Sustainable Drainage Systems and Richmond's Local Plan Policy LP 21.
